name: Icon Preview
description:
Preview icons while editing in realtime at different preset sizes for web, iOS and Android.


Previewing an icon


  1. Select an icon and run the plugin (must be a frame, component or instance).
  2. You will see a list of icons at different sizes for different platforms. Scroll to view more or resize the plugin window.


Locking the preview


To lock the preview to the current icon just click the lock icon in the top right of the plugin window.


Changing background colour


Change the preview panel background, by changing the canvas colour of your Figma file to anything but the default.


Things to note


The plugin currently only supports square icons up to 512px.
